title: I need a staff member  as soon as possible (cried already and I posted in wrong category)

embed.description: 1. What is a Chargeback? 2. My account is suspended I've been suspended for a chargeback, how can I get unbanned so I can return to the Fields of Justice? How long is the suspension? I don't ...

body: Hi, I'm here today to discuss something that happened 5 months ago. I was suspended, not knowing why and having to learn later that it was the person whom I had trusted a ton. I had to pay back $210.00 and I've gotten the money, in Rp cards as I had learned on this post made, and the link is included. I have saved small amounts of money, maybe 5 dollars a week, bothering my parents and feeling like a sack of poopy. I've gotten the help of my friends who still play league and here I am. 210 dollars in Rp. I submitted a ticket. Barely any help. Why would this post still be on here if I wouldn't be able to use Rp cards? I was so excited but once I saw the reply to my ticket, I was crushed. So please, any staff member out there, please please help me. It's been so long.

replies.body:
Fret not buddy!! Broporo oooon duty {{summoner:31}}

I've grabbed your ticket and it looks like we might be able to make something work! I have an agent on the job, so be sure to check your email for their response ^_^!
Oh, I don't think I emailed back right but she had asked for a picture of the cards but since I'd bought them online they don't have a physical form so I only have he codes... I'm really confused.

That's alright! Since you bought them online, make sure to send some screenshots of the code as well as any receipts for those codes if you can and we should still be able to help. 

Side note: If you don't get a reply very quickly, don't worry. Sometimes their queues can get a little backed up, but rest assured we'll get back to you as soon as we can!
